Étoile de Dublin.name: Star of Dublin
Étoile de Dublin.description: When knights address members of the Knight or when they discuss with characters considered allies of the organization, they receive a bonus of 1 automatic success on their roll.

Insigne d’honneur.name: Badge of Honor
Insigne d’honneur.description: This distinction symbolizes the efforts of the knights in their struggle to save Humanity. Now, when a knight must lose hope points, they always subtract 1 point from this loss. This bonus can perfectly combine with other reductions of this type.

Louve de Rome.name: She-Wolf of Rome
Louve de Rome.description: When knights perform social actions with outcasts, they receive a bonus of 1 automatic success on their roll.

Médaille de Saint-Georges qui terrasse l.name: Medal of Saint George Slaying the Dragon
Médaille de Saint-Georges qui terrasse l.description: When knights perform friendly or diplomatic social interactions with citizens or immortals, they receive a bonus of 1 automatic success.

Médaille du Graal.name: Medal of the Grail
Médaille du Graal.description: The distinction increases the knights' resistance to darkness. By wearing this distinction, the knights receive an additional point of Aegis.

Rose d’Angleterre.name: Rose of England
Rose d’Angleterre.description: The distinction increases the knights' confidence in their struggle and in themselves. When knights recover hope points during a mission (and only during a mission), they receive an additional hope point, regardless of the source of this recovery.

Ryoku-ju hōshō.name: Ryoku-ju hōshō
Ryoku-ju hōshō.description: When knights perform friendly or diplomatic social interactions with members of the Nodachi, they receive a bonus of 1 automatic success.

Table Ronde.name: Round Table
Table Ronde.description: As long as the character wears this distinction, they receive a bonus of 2 automatic successes on all their social interactions (persuasion, charm, intimidation, diplomacy, etc.) with humans, which can perfectly combine with other social bonuses.
